function RYU_EP05_17()
    -- .転-4【3月第1週】「近いけど、まだ遠くて」
    SaveData.Title = "近いけど、まだ遠くて"

    -- //BG：男子部教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｅ、リラ（笑顔）、ヒユ（笑顔）
    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ、先輩たち
    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ｃ・Ｆ・Ｇ、オウガ（笑顔）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_MOB08aa")
LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
-- LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_MOB04aa")
-- LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,-100)
-- LAYER_LOAD(60,"BUS_MOB05aa")
-- LAYER_POSITION(60,650,-100)
-- LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUS_MOB06aa")
-- LAYER_POSITION(65,-650,-100)
-- LAYER_LOAD(70,"BUS_MOB09aa")
-- LAYER_POSITION(70,450,-100)
LAYER_LOAD(75,"BUS_MAA01aa")
LAYER_POSITION(75,-550,0)
LAYER_LOAD(80,"BUS_OGA01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(80,550,0)
-- LAYER_LOAD(85,"BUS_MOB10aa")
-- LAYER_POSITION(85,-150,-100)
LAYER_LOAD(90,"BU_HIY01ea")
LAYER_POSITION(90,250,0)
LAYER_LOAD(100,"BU_RIR07ea")
LAYER_POSITION(100,-200,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    -- //SE：騒ぐ声
PLAY_SE("SEf017.wav",0,true)

    MSG([[ That day, the boys' club held a pre-celebration party. ]])

    MSG([[ Of course, the members of the boys' club gathered, and so did everyone from my "Knights." ]])

    MSG([[ It became a space where men and women were friendly with each other, hardly resembling a gathering of Uran's faction, who was the leader of the conservative side. ]])


STOP_SE("SEf017.wav",1000)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
-- LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
-- LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
-- LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
-- LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
LAYER_LOAD(80,"")
LAYER_LOAD(85,"")
LAYER_LOAD(90,"")
LAYER_LOAD(100,"")

    -- //BG：男子部校舎前（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0914.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "At last, it's tomorrow, isn't it?" ]])

--;吉★★ファイル名ミスの修正「minato_1271」→「minato_1270」（2020/01/28）
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1270.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yes. Tomorrow, everything will end." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ In the middle of that party. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran and I slipped out of the classroom and quietly toasted just the two of us, bathed in the sunset. ]])

    MSG([[ Today, I really wanted to talk with just her. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01fc")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0915.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I never imagined the day would come when I would hold a celebration including men..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1271.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Half a year ago, we were seriously at odds. Now, to be this close... it's a strange feeling." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At the end of last summer, we were looking at the sunset together like this. ]])

    MSG([[ Back then, we were enemies. Even while understanding each other's thoughts, positions, and feelings, we had no choice but to conflict. ]])

    MSG([[ Now, to be lovers. The more I think about it, the stranger it seems. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0916.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "...I suddenly wonder if everything I have done to protect Yuriai Private Academy was all mistaken." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0917.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Because Erika-san was there, I was able to change... But now, looking back, I think it was terribly self-righteous." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0918.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Perhaps it was not the Himegami family but us conservatives who have distorted Yuriai Private Academy more than anyone." ]])

    MSG([[ I shook my head at Uran's words. ]])

    MSG([[ I'm not the same as I was last summer, when I was constantly troubled. Now, I clearly see what I must do and what I want to do. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1272.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I can say for certain that Uran and your side were never wrong." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1273.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I know from experiencing both male and female perspectives that the differences between men and women are far greater than commonly thought." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1274.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Trying to remove all the barriers between genders—the cultural differences, values, physiques—is bound to fail." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1275.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Once changed, things can't go back. So changes should be made cautiously. Someone has to be the stopper." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Uran chuckled and gently leaned her shoulder against mine. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01fc")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0919.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "...That's true. But precisely because our values differ, when men and women cooperate, possibilities expand." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...Yes. Just like Uran and I are cooperating now to protect Yuriai Private Academy. Surely, we can support each other." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ha")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0920.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Because our values differ, if we can understand and support each other, we can accomplish greater things... That might be what it means to be men and women." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2145.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...I agree." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Agreeing with Uran's words, we placed our hands together. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ga")
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,50,100,Ease.InCubic)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,true)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,300,Ease.OutCubic)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0921.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Hya!" ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, Uran brushed my hand away and pulled back her own. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    -- //ボイスなし

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "" ]])
    -- //ボイスなし

    MSG([[ An awkward atmosphere enveloped the area. ]])

    MSG([[ I realized that there was still an insurmountable wall between Uran and me. ]])

    -- //BU：ウラン（驚き）、ヒユ（真剣・鼻血）、リラ（焦り）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_RIR07ga")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_HIY01bb")
LAYER_SCALE(50,120,120)
LAYER_SCALE(55,120,120)
LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,1000,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,700,0)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,800,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,500,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0491.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Isn't this the moment for a kiss!? What are you hesitating forーーー!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("rira_plus0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ba-ba-ba, stupid Hiyu!! I said don't come out!" ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, Hiyu and Lira tumbled out from the shadows right behind us. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("rira_plus0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Eh, eh, Erika, it's not like we were spying on you two being lovey-dovey or anything! It's more like, well, um!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0494.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I wanted to see you two kissーーーーーー!!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_RIR07da")
LAYER_SCALE(50,120,120)
LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("rira_plus0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "You have zero intention of making an excuse, huh!" ]])

    MSG([[ Lira smacked Hiyu hard on the head, but Hiyu had no intention of backing down. ]])

    MSG([[ I hadn't seen Hiyu so fired up since the pool lesson. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2146.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "H-Hiyu...? Is this okay? I'm a guy though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_HIY01da")
LAYER_SCALE(55,120,120)
LAYER_POSITION(55,500,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0496.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "As a yuri fan, I struggled... Calling you two yuri is heresy. You two are fake yuri. But! That doesn't matter anymore!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_HIY01eb")
LAYER_SCALE(55,120,120)
LAYER_POSITION(55,500,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0497.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "What matters is that my ideal big sisters are tenderly close! Categorization isn't needed!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUS_HIY01mb")
LAYER_SCALE(55,120,120)
LAYER_POSITION(55,500,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0498.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "As long as it's precious, that's all that counts! Now, imagine us as background, and retake! Holding hands, cheeks together, and all that and this――" ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_RIR07ba")
LAYER_SCALE(50,120,120)
LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1406.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "You stupid yuri berserker!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0499.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Ugh!!!" ]])

LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,500,-100,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Lira threw her arm around Hiyu's neck and quickly choked her out in an instant. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUS_RIR07fa")
LAYER_SCALE(50,120,120)
LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1407.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "S-Sorry for the interruption! Really, I'm sorry!" ]])

    MSG([[ Then, apologizing repeatedly, she ran off carrying the unconscious Hiyu. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,1000,0,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,700,-100,500,Ease.Linear)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
WAIT(500)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- //BU：ウラン（驚き）
LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01fa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0922.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "This school really is lively." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2147.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yes. Every day is truly fun and never boring." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2148.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Let’s protect it. This Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0923.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. Let's protect it... together, combining our strength." ]])

    MSG([[ Left alone, we exchanged wry smiles and vowed victory for tomorrow. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_18")
end
